typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_Id as string,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> customers
source(output(
		transaction_id as string,
		cust_id as string,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as string,
		prod_cat_code as string,
		Qty as string,
		Rate as string,
		Tax as string,
		total_amt as string,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> transactions
source(output(
		prod_cat_code as string,
		prod_cat as string,
		prod_sub_cat_code as string,
		prod_subcat as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Products
customers, transactions join(customer_Id == cust_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Products join(transactions@prod_cat_code == Products@prod_cat_code
	&& prod_subcat_code == prod_sub_cat_code,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
